{"data": {"production":{"id":"moonrise_kingdom","production_title":"Moonrise Kingdom","production_status":3,"production_type":"film","production_desc":"

Moonrise Kingdom<\/em><\/strong> is the seventh film directed by two-time Academy Award-nominated filmmaker Wes Anderson<\/strong><\/span><\/a> (The Royal Tenenbaums<\/em><\/strong><\/span><\/a>).<\/p>

Set on an island off the coast of New England in the summer of 1965, Moonrise Kingdom<\/em> tells the story of two 12-year-olds who fall in love, make a secret pact, and run away together into the wilderness. As various authorities try to hunt them down, a violent storm is brewing off-shore – and the peaceful island community is turned upside down in every which way. Bruce Willis<\/strong><\/span><\/a> plays the local sheriff, Captain Sharp. Edward Norton<\/strong><\/span><\/a> is a Khaki Scout troop leader, Scout Master Ward. Bill Murray<\/strong><\/span><\/a> and Frances McDormand<\/strong><\/span><\/a> portray the young girl’s parents, Mr. and Mrs. Bishop. The cast also includes Tilda Swinton<\/strong><\/span><\/a>, Jason Schwartzman<\/strong><\/span><\/a>, and Bob Balaban<\/strong><\/span><\/a>; and introduces Jared Gilman<\/strong><\/span><\/a> and Kara Hayward<\/strong><\/span><\/a> as Sam and Suzy, the boy and girl.<\/p>","in_theaters":"
